page.title: 05OLD ELLERBY: Life-style
page.content:
{Transport:}There are six buses a day, Hull in one direction, Hornsea in the other, and geared to commuting times. All children bus to Sproatley or to South Holderness Comprehensive School. Most households have a vehicle, some two or more.
{Properties}in the village do not change hands often and are{privately {owned}and very individual in style. The public amenities are The Blue Bell pub, and a telephone kiosk. People like the peace and tranquillity of the village in spite of the frightening roar of occasional fast, low aircraft approaching an offshore bombing range. The bustle of{Hull}or the quieter style of{Beverley}are only 15 minutes' drive away.
